title: New: Wavering Hands – No Constant
body: Swiss outfit **Wavering Hands** aka **Rolf Laureijs** has just announced the details of his debut EP, **_I Remember Nothing_**, out 1 February on [Oh Sister Records](http://ohsisterrecords.com/wp/?p=1847). _No Constant_, the first cut to be taken from said EP is a languid slice of Beach Fossils and Wild Nothing inspired dreampop, and whilst not breaking new ground, it’s a healthy indication of what’s to come from the young musician.
